Text: My God!  I've never read such an utter load of bull crap in my life.  This takes the "Big Lie: to heights even Reichminister Goebbels would have blushed at.      Of course, it is the very New World Order, orchestrated by Bush' Senior and Junior, who have abridged human rights, started and fought a financially crippling war for oil under the guise of fighting terrorism, attempted to set up a home grown theocracy in the United States (organized by the Christian Right), etc.  If you're going to spew, at least spew in the "right" direction.
